website_summaries.verdict: Good level of performance for a compact yet powerful gas-powered power washer.
pros: For those who need a bit more power in a pressure washer, it delivers good performance for the home user
Offers 2,700 psi of water pressure and 2.5 gallons per minute of water delivery
Handle and 2-wheel design is easy to move
cons: Gas units require more maintenance versus electric units

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entry level machine.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent entry level gas pressure washer. Assembly instructions are almost useless but very easy to figure out by yourself. Starts easy, works easy and very good power for cleaning. I've done decks, siding, and cars. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Landman

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, for about 4 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, for about 4 minutes. Gun fell apart in pieces after 5 minutes. Pump failed after 90 minutes. Has been sitting at an authorized service center for 2 months (2 hours away), Karcher won't send the right parts to fix it, and service center barely picks up their phone. So I have a brand new unit, multiple projects backed up, some are paid projects, am out $260 and no unit to use. Garbage, only thing worse is discourteous Karcher corporate service.
customer_reviews.author: erdsav

customer_reviews.title: This is a good pressure washer and the tips work great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pressure washer and the tips work great. There is a plate that is supposed to keep the hose from touching the hot engine...well, it doesn't work. My hose worked itself under the plate and BLAMO! Water shooting everywhere. I bought a longer hose to replace it and modified the plate to keep it from happening again. Other than that, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: High Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Powerful PW But Leaky Pump
customer_reviews.text: Nice & powerful machine. Easy assembly. However, once I started using, the pump started leaking fluid and I knew it was only a matter of time before it would fail. Upon checking the box in which it came, I noticed a wide oil stain at the bottom. For this reason and based on other reviews which reported failing or failed pumps I decided to return to Amazon within the window. Too bad because I really like the PW.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product! We bought it in 2017 , used it once and needed to bring it in for repair. Took 2 months before it was fixed! So didn’t get to use it that year. Last year we used it a few times now today in the middle of power washing my lawn furniture it stopped working!!! I had my Old Briggs and Stratton power washer for 15 years before it died out! This is ridiculous to have something for 2 years and it keeps breaking down!!!!
customer_reviews.author: angela sanfelice

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks..Broke down bought july 04 2017 warranty..no help
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer leaking oil and gas..cant get the company to get anyone to fix with warranty. Bought 2017 two year warranty. Need replaced...Would not reccommend this product for anyone. Amazon dont sell this product. Local would charge 85.00 to look at it and try to fix, but what good is a warranty? Frustrated...Why 100 characters? Called and talked to people and contacted local Erath area which is a distance wouldnt do..and talked to Karchers rep. said might be simple thing. Oh, Not much more to say..product sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J. Mccall

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box this was a nice pressure washer. However, after about an hour of use things began to go south. 1 the muffler bolts vibrated loose and the muffler fell off. One of the bolts snapped off. 2 the plastic housing vibrated 3 of the 4 screws completely out. Where they ended up I haven’t got a clue. 3 the motor vibrated 2 of the 3 bolts that hold it to the cart off. I’ve spent more time trying to put it back together than power washing.
customer_reviews.author: John Glaser

customer_reviews.title: I think its did an excellent job so far
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought that I would give this washer a shot. I've had it 2+ weeks now and have used it several times. Mostly to clean siding on houses. I think its did an excellent job so far. The unit starts on the first pull which was impressive and the auto engine speed control seems to work very well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer works great, but make sure to read the comments on reviews before you put the oil in. The instructions for the engine are wrong. But it seems to be a good unit. I have used it three times and did a really nice job. To this point really happy it is gas powered and not electric. One less hose/cord to pull around
customer_reviews.author: Bob P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Power washer only had maybe 10 hours of usage time before it shut off. Upon trying to start it back up, white smoke billowed out of it, and it wouldn't start. After three or four attempts the pull cord would no longer retract from the engine. For the few hours it actually worked it was nice. Easy to start and had some power. But, for the price you certainly expect more than this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: DLD

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine. It did a great job on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. It did a great job on my brick home and sidewalk. I can't wait to use it on more! I like the easy swapping of the nozzles. I wish the hose was a little more flexible it's hard to wrap back up on the holder
customer_reviews.author: niceguynepa

customer_reviews.title: ... this machine for about 3 months and I'm completely satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for about 3 months and I'm completely satisfied with it. Have used it here in Texas to clean my boat,car, driveway and side of the house. Has performed exceptionally well. I highly recommend this pressure washer for all around the house use. Waiting for the price to go down so I can get another one for my home in Phoenix
customer_reviews.author: Kirk D Owens

customer_reviews.title: Motor froze up after only 8 uses and full of oil.
customer_reviews.text: I only had this out of the box for 3 months and I have used it about 8 times to pressure wash 2 vehicles. After 3 or 4 surges in the units power, i started to look to see if my garden hose was crimped and BANG! The motor froze up with a full tank of oil. BUYER BEWARE. Now I have to drive it 50 miles away to the closest service center. Next time I'll buy a honda.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Nay

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over 2 years and used it a handful of times. Always starts up quickly and no issues so far. A lot better than the electric ones I had before.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!..... The power washer arrived on time. It was packed well. It was really easy to assemble. Upon, assembling the power washer,it started on the first pull. it worked better than I thought. I would order this power washer again.
customer_reviews.author: DLE

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: if i could take it back i would, i bought this 2 years and now i need a new one, looking for parts is very hard, i still can not find what i need, calling karcher was just a waist of time no help at all. i work hard for my money and it took a lot for me to buy this tool. so think really hard before you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no service coverage , but at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few months ago the product stopped working abruptly , tried to reach out to customer service and the only suggestion I got was to go back to the website for warranty service locations , which are virtually non existent around houston, tx area, and the one that exists is only available during limited hours and miles away in the middle of nowhere location
customer_reviews.author: denvercustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Assembly literally took 5 minutes. Started 1st pull every time....only used it for 1 day so far but it seems like a very good washer. Just make sure you put enough oil in it.
customer_reviews.author: Len V

customer_reviews.title: Great washer. I have used it many times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great washer. I have used it many times and works like a charm. Pressure is amazing and does all you need it to do for residential use
customer_reviews.author: ledio

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot and is powerful
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot and is powerful! Is way better then electric unit. But after two months of heavy use, the handle already is leaking some water so I deducted two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Santry

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement for my 17 year old pressure washer that died. Did some research, saw good reviews for this model. So far, so good. Excellent pressure, love the push button start.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: No pressure on operator!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well. Much better than the Genrac that I bought here and is now headed for the trash after 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Shut down after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Needed new carburetor after 6 months. Warranty would not cover. Company says we have to start it once every 4 months or so. Never heard of that one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding......
customer_reviews.text: I received this Pressure Washer and found it to be easy to put together... Starts right up and does a great job. I could not have asked for a better PW... The detergent container is very nice and all I need now is an extension hose...
customer_reviews.author: James C. Reneau

customer_reviews.title: Easy starting
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this. Filled it with oil and gas, pumped it a couple of pulls with the start switch off, turned switch to on an it starts first pull, have used it a couple of times and always starts with in two pulls. Lots of power.
customer_reviews.author: William Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once thus far, but worked great. Very easy / minor assembly. Started with very first pull and each time after. Very easy operation and did an excellent job with the various nozzle tips included, both upper and lower house.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer
customer_reviews.text: Great power washer. Lots of power with quick change washer tips. Great name in washers. Nice wheels that make moving easy.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ambler

customer_reviews.title: Strong performance
customer_reviews.text: Have used it at least a half dozen times and has started on the first pull each time. It comes with a variety of tips too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: This machine performs exactly as advertised. It appears to be sturdy and comes well equipped.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Deck, car, house and windows why did I not buy this sooner? Easy to use. Does a five star job.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dowgin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this pressure washer for a couple of years now with at least 200 hrs. of use and still working like a champ. Still starts on first pull. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: BAK

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the warranty
customer_reviews.text: My hose just blew up I used the thing two times. Almost took my arm off. Then I tried to use my foursquare warranty and found out it is for electronics not power washers.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Karcher isn't what I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: High pressure Pump broke after the fifth time it was used. It's not even a year old. It's still under warranty. And I've been waiting 3 months for the replacement pump. Because it's on back order. You know why it's on back order? Because they all break.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bogaert

customer_reviews.title: Karcher has always made a great product and this one should last me a long ...
customer_reviews.text: $100 less than anything locally. Karcher has always made a great product and this one should last me a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily portable, excellent pressure
customer_reviews.text: Starts easily, runs well, plenty of pressure for the toughest jobs.
customer_reviews.author: TexasFrank

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hose broke when used third time. No place to buy replacement parts. .
customer_reviews.author: FeepakAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great power washer
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy put gas in it and it started right up good pressure actually everything about it is good
customer_reviews.author: William Benson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup. I switched over from homeowner plug in pressure washer and this was quite an upgrade. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: joe zito

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will complete review when the weather gets warmer and I can use it
customer_reviews.author: CFT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Have been using it regularly and it starts easy and performs well
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Defective Flat Tires
customer_reviews.text: Received package. Assembled. Found one wheel flat. Would not hold air pressure. Called Karcher for replacement. Back ordered 4-6 weeks. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K Jones

customer_reviews.title: Karcher G2700 not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted less than a month before it lost all pressure. The operators manual is useless for trouble shooting. I'm assuming the pump is shot as the motor still runs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Great power! Crappy Carburetor!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month. Great Power! Started with the first pull. Then the carburetor started flooding with fuel so bad that it soaked the air filter with fuel and wouldn't run. We have to clamp the fuel line or the fuel with just run right through all over the garage floor. Once we do get it started we have to "babysit" the fuel line clamp or it will flood and won't run!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started up on first pull and did a superb job on my pool deck.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Strebeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy overall with this washer. Powerful enough to do any job I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Formby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: after using twice, leaked oil all over driveway and garage
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: the parts break easily and it cost more to replace the parts than ...
customer_reviews.text: the parts break easily and it cost more to replace the parts than to buy it brand new. For example, to replace a cylinder head, it would cost around 200$. I would recommend going with electric for less maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Power Washer, the service department refuse to service this product, too many problems. I am so dissatisfied with this product. I changed the oil and still not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for all decks and sidewalk s easily changed power fitting
customer_reviews.author: Budweiser

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, works ok
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, works ok. I wish some engineering would have went into water connector, which is in pretty inconvenient place
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: great new power toy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been enjoying his latest toy! Easy to start - even I can do it. You just put the gas in, pull the start cord and away you go. I have a terrible time with most power washers - turn this thing on while holding this and water has to be on and things blow off or it won't start at all. This is easy! and does a nice job as well! Now to attack the back patio deck.......
customer_reviews.author: Swimmom

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA, Sad to say.
customer_reviews.text: You pay for German Brand and engineering....But get MADE IN CHINA engine and pump. It surges a lot but seems to get the job done. We will see once stuff breaks if warranty covers it.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Too many things went wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Karcher. Pump broke on 1st after about 4 years and authorized repair shop told me it would be cheaper to get a new one which I did. G2700 started easily. First nozzle I used but not properly made with opening blocked. Used 2nd nozzle. With in a minute or two, hose burst. Fortunately still had 2nd high quality hose I had bought for first machine. A few days later tried again. After 20 minutes pressure dropped off and after another 10 minutes, zero pressure. Tried all the remedies suggested in instructions but nothing worked. Returning the machine. Still waiting for replacement hose and nozzle
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L

customer_reviews.title: it runs Great once I serviced it started on the first pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks this G2700 Gas Power Pressure Washer I ever had it dose everything I need it for ,it runs Great once I serviced it started on the first pull it and run very queit Thanks Again
customer_reviews.author: Edward C Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Awesome pressure, easy to start. Cleans really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: Wrong instructions
customer_reviews.text: It came with the wrong assembly instructions. The were for a different model. Once we watched a you tube video we were able to properly assemble it. So far the unit works well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fedor

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Changed From Electric To Gas
customer_reviews.text: Only a few uses so far, but much more powerful than my former electric pressure washer, and much easier to store. Noisier, but I don't like my neighbor much so I don't really care about that. Washes my patio really well, which I do care about. The granite on my wall and the slate on my floor look better than they have in many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: works great.. would even be better with longer hose
customer_reviews.text: Price very competitive, works great.. would even be better with longer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Rifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely much more than I expected fantastic thing works great started second pool its just unbelievably good
customer_reviews.author: ian myles

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Cleaned a motor with it and it totally did the job. Cleaned cement sidewalk and it looks great. Next I'm cleaning my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Castro

customer_reviews.title: No star here
customer_reviews.text: 5 months and motor seized, had to go buy a Honda, not a good product!!
customer_reviews.author: jeanine dunham

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire can't replace it!
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer works just fine but the wheels won't stay on-fall off when moving around-and one wheel came out of the box flat. Cannot get it replaced so am very unhappy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A. Mcgirr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has tremendous power and I love the quick attach nozzles
customer_reviews.author: Dean Malone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: doing good so far, lets see what the future holds
customer_reviews.author: Louis r cicconi sr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great runs great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great runs great. How ever when I took it out of the box to assemble one of the wheels was missing the locking push pin to lock the wheel into the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer. Got it home and put it together. Started on the 1st pull.
customer_reviews.author: Tedrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this washer to flush the remaining paint off a weather worn barn. It performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Sycamore

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the motor cranks
customer_reviews.text: Motor has frozen and won’t crank/pull at all. Avoid this brand at all cause. It was pain in the a$& to have it ship back to Amazon. I wish Amazon would make sure the product works first before shipping off to the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work After One Use - No Return Options
customer_reviews.text: Used this product once. It worked great. Started it up the second time (1 day later) and it runs fine, but does not build pressure. I have checked all gaskets, gas, oil, obstructions, water pressure, etc. Nothing remedies it. Tired to contact Amazon to return it - not an option. Tried to contact Karcher to return it - have not heard back in 15 days. Frustrating. Don't buy from Amazon Warehouse or Karcher.
customer_reviews.author: AMaas

customer_reviews.title: Not so nice as I thought
customer_reviews.text: This system has too many nozzles and I also bought 2 special nozzles for cleaning the back side of my house (basement + main floor + top floor). The special nozzle supplied for 2 story home actually barely reaches the top of the main floor and thereafter it fizzles out completely. No power on my top floor sidings at all. This system also has limitation of using only Karcher make cleaning detergent which is really a mild cleaner. I spent 4 hours trying to take away mildew from my rear sidings but, it hardly cleaned. It acts OK on concrete floors only. The system is extremely noisy too even with stabilizer added to fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Biswadev Roy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TERRIBLE PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE COMPLAINING, but this is ridiculous. I bought this item new on May 29, 2017. The pump (you know, the whole point of the machine) broke during my SECOND USE! This is a terrible product! So I called Karcher, and they referred me to a local dealer, who refused the work because of the ridiculous process of unpaid labor required by Karcher. So now I have an expensive piece of garbage sitting in my garage. Thanks, Karcher. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Lutyens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the pressure washer. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. Other reviews helped me decide on this product. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: james d stanchik

customer_reviews.title: other than that great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Don't leave the nozzles on or they will rust, other than that great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: housemarketing

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery, it was a breeze to assemble and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery , it was a breeze to assemble and started on first try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and am very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to wash my driveway this summer, and am very pleased with the results. My only complaint is that while you're not actively spraying water the engine idols a little heavy. It sounds almost like there's a little choke on it, and I assume it's so that less fuel is consumed, but it sounds alarming.
customer_reviews.author: Duane M. Zamrok

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly disappointed haven't even had this a year and my handle and trigger have already broken! I only used it twice last year and it was stored in a shed all winter I don't think I should have to already be replacing some thing on this so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Christensen

customer_reviews.title: My second Karcher
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Karcher, the first one has lasted about 15 years and is still operational. This one came on time in excellent condition and was very simple to put into operation. Cleans like a champ with great pressure, I really like how the nozzles change out and the on board soap tank.
customer_reviews.author: GoneFor Good

customer_reviews.title: easy to use runs quite and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Started up on first try, easy to use runs quite and performs well. Great results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS OIL
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box and it leaks oil out of the bottom. I looks like its coming from the bottom side of the water pump but it is hard to tell. Spray pressure is good. Changing tips is very easy. Starts easy on the first pull
customer_reviews.author: T. Harper

customer_reviews.title: ... to clean my decks and patios and am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to clean my decks and patios and am very happy with it. One bad thing is there is on way to hold the spray handle in the on position and my hand gives out. I think they tried but the lever is upside down and it locks it in a position that you can not engage the sprayer. Probably made in China!! I have to find a way to keep it on my hand can't take it.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and use. I don't care for the way the handle is designed. You can never really tighten it so it stays steady. The engine started on the first pu, although I could still not find the choke.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. It is really easy to start, it has started on the first pull every time so far. I have mostly used it for cleaning the siding and concrete patio. Only downside is that it seems to burn through fuel pretty quickly. It seems like as soon as I get on a roll with cleaning, it runs out of gas after only about 20-30 minutes. This is my first pressure washer so I'm not sure if that is normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good power, Lousy powder
customer_reviews.text: Just used machine for 1st time. Started right up and even though I don't have the most consistent water pressure the machine kept an even stream the whole time. This might not sound like a problem, but it has with other washers I have used. The only complaint I have is that the powder coat on the frame was chipping right out of the box, otherwise I would have given 5 stars. If Karcher sends out the frames they should look into another company or if they do the coating themselves they should inspect more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Took a beating
customer_reviews.text: The machine came in a box that was more round than square.Should have returned it but needed it NOW. One of the wheels was bent the handles were twisted and the muffler was tweaked. Once again I needed it so an hour and a half later it looked almost as good as new. It works very well. The delivery people obviously hated it so it wasn't the machines fault. I now need a small beverage fridge but I may just buy one locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple. Read everything before putting together, and it's a snap! Added fluids, and made all connections per the instructions, flipped the switch to "On", and pulled the starter cord.....fired up on the first pull. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Harold P

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I only have about 2 hrs on the new pressure washer. So far it is performing just fine. I am very pleased to this point, but it's really early in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Shopkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Traditionally easy to put together. Extremely easy to start. Nice power and cleans well. Used it on the driveway, front porch, and sidewalk today.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bryan Wayne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Does good job but lots of problems
customer_reviews.text: The manual had me overfill with oil the first time. Instructions clearly say to fill it 3/4 of the way up the dipstick. I thought that was a little much, but figured they know what they're talking about. I know very little about engines. First pull, engine starts, and then almost immediately, billows of white smoke pour out of the exhaust until the engine quit. Then I saw the SECOND manual that showed me the proper oil level. Had to drain the oil. Then the unit worked well. Until the detergent tank started shooting water from it. Somehow it fills with water from the pump and starts squirting through the cap like a fountain. What's going on here???
customer_reviews.author: Syddd

customer_reviews.title: It is very powerful and easy to you use
customer_reviews.text: It is very powerful and easy to you use. Works great on the car and for the rest of the house, garage, steps etc. Would definitely recommending buying
customer_reviews.author: marion

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but it use the whole cleaning fluid tank in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but it use the whole cleaning fluid tank in a few seconds. Maybe I did something wrong. Lots of power
customer_reviews.author: raymond gary

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works greAT. Fast shipping.. I love it. My husband was like a little kid when he was using it to wash the cars
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ward

customer_reviews.title: Pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to change tips. The first one that I ordered came with a handle that didn't fit the machine and had to be returned. The rep at Amazon was less than helpful at first. The only "problem" I have with the pressure washer is that the hose inlet is under the frame and can be a pain to get the hose screwed in and then unscrew it. Other than that it works well and I have used it a few times, starts up easily and instructions were clear on the assembly. Haven't tried it with the soap yet, but it's doing a good job without it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money. Cleans quickly and efficiently. Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! I combined it with the 15" Karcher Surface Cleaner. It cuts cleaning time and is easy to maneuver. The machine is sturdy but easy to move around; I really like the wide tires. I'm a middle-aged female user and am very happy with this purchase. * Please note: One of the instruction booklets provides incorrect information regarding oil level. Fill only up to the second line in dipstick, NOT halfway up.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Need help!
customer_reviews.text: Please, I need help. The instructions are too vague regarding manual engine control. The control lever look nothing like the manual!
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Splurge for gas!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pressure washer in 3 years. The previous 2 years I wasted around a hundred bucks each on 2 electric washers. Each of them broke before the season ended. With this washer I didn't have to break my back bending over to get the nozzle an inch away from the surface because this thing has power to spare! Easy assembly and was up and running in minutes. The only downfall was not coming with motor oil. Luckily I had some lying around. Well worth the money and hopefully will continue to care for my home for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Buckley

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad it didn't cut me in half
customer_reviews.text: The 3200 PSI hose burst the 3rd time I used it! I'm glad it didn't cut me in half!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The handle, where it connects to a heavy main ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle, where it connects to a heavy main frame, is too weak and bends. The screw, where the parts connect, have vibrated off, and the metal parts have bent, rusted, and paint is peeling after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma T. Peppers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more. Assembly time to first use 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Romer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for the price. I think the manuals could be more clear. Seems they skip over some information. Otherwise, does the job well and is very sturdy and well built. I have gone through 20 tank fulls at least so far without any trouble. It is important to change oil after break-in period. The oil when drained the first time was clearly contaminated. I am going to change oil again soon, just to be thorough.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

product_meta.title: Karcher G2900X Gas Pressure Washer, 2900 PSI, 2.4 GPM
product_meta.description: Style:G2900XThe G 2900 X was developed to offer strong cleaning performance that is both easy to use and store. This gas pressure washer delivers 2900 PSI of TruPRESSURE™, ensuring you get the highest level of cleaning power. The G 2900 X is powered by the performance driven Karcher KPS 196 cc engine with auto choke for easy starting; just pull and clean. This easy to start pressure washer is backed by a 3 year engine and 2 year pump warranty. This was designed with the user in mind with features like one-half gallon removable detgent tank, four spray nozzles to get the job done right, oversized 12" wheels, onboard accessory storage, and easy access to all hose connections. The rugged, all welded, steel frame design alows for easy start up out of the box; no tools required for assembly and can be set up in five minutes. Universal quick-connect nozzles and standard M22 hose connections simplify nozzle and accessory usage.
feature_bullets: Powerful Karcher KPS 196cc engine with auto choke and cast iron piston sleeve for easy starts and reliable performance
Removable ½ gallon detergent tank for easy use and filling/cleaning
Folding handle for compact storage, takes up less garage space
Oversized 12", flat-free wheels for easy maneuvering
Robust welded frame for maximum durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars17 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
